startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of StockX product URLs to scrape. Each URL should point to a single product page.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max requests per crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape. Use 0 for unlimited.

validateSizes.title: Validate sizes
validateSizes.description: Enable size chart validation to detect missing sizes for each brand.

includeMissingSizes.title: Include missing sizes
includeMissingSizes.description: Add missing sizes to the output data. Only works if size validation is enabled.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Apify Proxy is highly recommended to avoid blocking.
